periods.name: Rest Of Today
periods.detailedForecast:
Mostly cloudy. A 20 percent chance of showers in
the afternoon. Highs in the mid 60s. Northeast winds 5 to 10 mph.

periods.name: Tonight
periods.detailedForecast:
Cloudy. A chance of showers in the evening, then
showers after midnight. Lows in the lower 50s. North winds 5 to
10 mph. Chance of rain 50 percent in the evening increasing to
80 percent after midnight.

periods.name: Tuesday
periods.detailedForecast:
Cloudy. Showers likely in the morning, then a chance
of showers in the afternoon. Highs in the lower 60s. Northeast
winds 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70 percent in the morning
decreasing to 50 percent in the afternoon.

periods.name: Tuesday Night
periods.detailedForecast:
Cloudy with a 50 percent chance of showers. Lows
in the mid 50s. Northeast winds 5 to 10 mph.

periods.name: Wednesday
periods.detailedForecast:
Showers likely and isolated thunderstorms. Highs in
the mid 60s. Northeast winds 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain
60 percent in the morning increasing to 70 percent in the
afternoon.

periods.name: Wednesday Night
periods.detailedForecast:
Cloudy. Showers and isolated thunderstorms in
the evening, then a chance of showers and isolated thunderstorms
after midnight. Lows in the mid 50s. Chance of rain 80 percent in
the evening decreasing to 50 percent after midnight.

periods.name: Thursday
periods.detailedForecast:
Mostly cloudy with a 20 percent chance of showers.
Highs in the mid 60s.

periods.name: Thursday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Lows in the lower 50s.

periods.name: Friday
periods.detailedForecast:
Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming mostly
sunny. Highs around 70.

periods.name: Friday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear. Lows in the mid 50s.

periods.name: Saturday
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. Highs in the upper 70s.

periods.name: Saturday Night
periods.detailedForecast: Mostly clear. Lows in the mid 50s.
